DataElement.preferredName: Decline Less Than Neutrophil Count 500 Recovery Greater Than or Equal To Integer::3-Day Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year a decline in the neutrophil count to less than 500 per cubic millimeter for 3 days or more.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Decline Less Than Neutrophil Count 500 Recovery Greater Than or Equal To Integer::3-Day Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Becoming progressively lower, growing weaker, or going from better to worse._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::3_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds.  This also refers to a specific day._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Declining Less Than Neutrophil Count 500 Recovery
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Becoming progressively lower, growing weaker, or going from better to worse.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Becoming progressively lower, growing weaker, or going from better to worse.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Integer::3 Day Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part.::3:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
